channel.title: How to add a camelot party room
channel.description:
Hello, I am planning on adding a [s]falador[/s] camelot party room to my server. I can code it all, only issue is I don't know how it is supposed to function.
This is all I know about it.
1. Can put items in chest. 2. Pull lever and balloon objects fall down 3. clicking on these objects send player animation and leaves an item from the chest on the floor
I would like to be more informed about how the items feed into the drop chest, as well as how the balloons are meant to spawn, fall down, and drop the items.

item.title: How to add a camelot party room
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

Docent:

how it is supposed to function.

[ul][]check if any items are in the chest
[]display chest items (if any)
[]start timer once items are in chest
[]drop balloons (in party room area) and clear chest at end of timer[/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a camelot party room

item.title: How to add a camelot party room
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

If it has the party room, chest(object), balloons, we can continue talking. ;D

Read full topic
